DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy brexpiprazole adjunctive treatment paroxetine ( PAR ) sertraline ( SER ) PTSD symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Brexpiprazole Adjunctive Treatment Paroxetine Sertraline Adult Patients Suffering From Post-traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD )
DOC.criteria: The patient PTSD , diagnose accord DSMIVTR™ confirm Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( MINI ) . The patient ClinicianAdministered PTSD Scale Part 2 ( CAPS2 ) total score ≥70 Screening Baseline Visits . The reported duration PTSD least 3 month . The index traumatic event lead development PTSD take place 15 year screen . The patient severe personality disorder investigator 's opinion may interfere conduct study . The patient significant suicidal risk . Other inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
